CRenderSubMesh

Implements IRenderSubMesh

Members
m_VB

Vertex/Index data for this submesh

m_NormalVB

Vertex/Index data for this submesh along with lines representing the normal vectors

m_spFrontMaterial

Material with which to render front facing polygons

m_spBackMaterial

Material with which to render back facing polygons

m_spShader

Shader to use for rendering

m_bbox

bounding box of submesh

m_flags

Mesh flags inherited from the ISubMesh
